data.title: Search Engine Dashboard

data.title: Attendance Calendar
data.description: React - Redux / via fullcalendar package. Development of attendence calendar with the ability to create a teacher's schedule for the day and keep up a record of the students present in the each group.

data.title: Notes App
data.description: React - Redux - Typescript / Simple Notes application. Adding and editing notes.
